title: Leaving On A Jet Plane
lyrics:
[intro] (C)
 
All my (C)bags are packed I'm (F)ready to go
I'm (C)standing here out-(F)side your door
I (C)hate to wake you (Dm)up to say good-(G)bye (G7)
But the (C)dawn is breaking itâ€™s (F)early morn
The (C)taxi's waitin, he's (F)blowin his horn
(C) Already I'm so (Dm)lonesome I could (G7)die
 
[chorus]
So (C)kiss me and (F)smile for me
(C)Tell me that you'll (F)wait for me
(C)Hold me like you'll (Dm)never let me (G7)go
Cause I'm (C)leavin (F)on a jet plane
(C) Don't know when (F)I'll be back again
(C) Oh (Dm)babe, I (G)hate to go (G7) (G) (G)
 
There's (C)so many times, I've (F)let you down
So (C)many times, I've (F) played around
(C) I tell you now (Dm) they don't mean a (G) thing (G7)
Every (C)place I go, I'll (F)think of you
Every (C)song I sing, I'll (F)sing for you
When (C)I come back, (Dm)I'll bring your wedding (G7)ring
 
[chorus]
So (C)kiss me and (F)smile for me
(C)Tell me that you'll (F)wait for me
(C)Hold me like you'll (Dm)never let me (G7)go
Cause I'm (C)leavin (F)on a jet plane
(C) Don't know when (F)I'll be back again
(C) Oh (Dm)babe, I (G)hate to go (G7) (G) (G)
 
(C) Now the time (F) has come to leave you
(C) One more time (F) let me kiss you
(C) Then close your eyes (Dm) I'll (G)be on my way (G7)
(C)Dream about the (F)days to come
When (C)I won't have to (F)leave alone
A-(C)bout the times (Dm) I won't (G)have to say (G7)
 
[chorus]
So (C)kiss me and (F)smile for me
(C)Tell me that you'll (F)wait for me
(C)Hold me like you'll (Dm)never let me (G7)go
Cause I'm (C)leavin (F)on a jet plane
(C) Don't know when (F)I'll be back again
(C) Oh (Dm)babe, I (G)hate to go (G7)
 
[outro]
I'm (C)leavin (F)on a jet plane
(C) Don't know when (F)I'll be back again
(C) Oh (Dm)babe, I (G)hate to go (G7) (G) (G) (C) [end]
